name: Magical Drop
overview: This is the first game in the Magical Drop series. Similar to other titles in the series, the goal of the game is to clear the screen of constantly advancing objects called 'drops'. The player character, stuck at the bottom of the screen, has a grapple which can be used to pull down a single drop, change its color and put it back in line. Drops disappear when a line of three or more drops of the same color is created.
